text: Hydroselenide is an ion. Its chemical formula is HSe-. Hydroselenides are normally made in neutral or slightly basic conditions. If it is very basic, selenides are made. If it is acidic, hydrogen selenide is made. ==Related pages== *Selenate *Selenite Category:Selenium compounds Category:Hydrogen compounds Category:Amphoteric compounds Category:Anions
title: Hydroselenide
